channel.title: Mini game help.... PLEASE

item.title: Mini game help.... PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @KnightMarE KnightMarE
item.description:
@KnightMarE wrote:

alright ive added a minigame… or im trying to add it so where ur in one spot… you get teled to another… here is my code if (Mini > 0) { Mini -= 1; } else if (Mini <= 0) { teleportToX = 2907; teleportToY = 9690; if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 )); newheadicon2 = 1; headIcon = newheadicon2; sendMessage("The Game has started"); Mini = 180; }
but everytime it updates it teles you no matter where u are… anyhelp?

Read full topic
